text: Timber Fury is a 1950 American western film directed by Bernard B. Ray and starring David Bruce, Laura Lee and Nicla Di Bruno.Pitts p.357 ==Cast== * David Bruce as Jim Caldwell * Laura Lee as Phyllis Wilson * Nicla Di Bruno as Yvonne * Sam Flint as Henry Wilson * George Slocum as Arnold McCabe * Lee Phelps as Sheriff Williams * Gil Frye as Pete * Paul Hoffman as Spike * Spencer Chan as Chung * Myron Healey as Paxton Man * Ray Jones as Barfly * Hank Mann as Joe, the Bartender ==References== ==Bibliography== * Pitts, Michael R. Western Movies: A Guide to 5,105 Feature Films. McFarland, 2012. ==External links== * Category:1950 films Category:1950s Western (genre) adventure films Category:English-language films Category:American films Category:American Western (genre) adventure films Category:Films directed by Bernard B. Ray Category:Eagle-Lion Films films Category:American black-and- white films Category:Films set in forests Category:Films scored by Raoul Kraushaar
title: Timber Fury
